# nb-timeline-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description        | Type      | Default        |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------ | --------- | -------------- |
| `color`  | `color`   | 时间线节点颜色,暂时只支持rgb格式 | `string`  | `'59,152,252'` |
| `icon`   | `icon`    | 自定义icon类           | `string`  | `undefined`    |
| `shadow` | `shadow`  | 是否显示节点阴影           | `boolean` | `true`         |
| `tail`   | `tail`    | 是否显示时间线条           | `boolean` | `false`        |
